cohortName: [PL 197320001] Acute renal failure syndrome referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (197320) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 197320002] Acute renal failure syndrome referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (197320) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 197320003] Acute kidney injury diagnosis during hospitalization, without prior end-stage renal disease or transplant
logicDescription: Acute kidney injury diagnosis during hospitalization, without prior end-stage renal disease or transplant

cohortName: [PL 197320004] Acute kidney injury diagnosis during hospitalization, defined by condition occurrences of 'acute renal failure' conceptset occurring between start and end of inpatient visit
logicDescription: Acute kidney injury diagnosis during hospitalization, defined by condition occurrences of 'acute renal failure' conceptset occurring between start and end of inpatient visit
